trans-unit.target: TEXT_JOBDRK299_02110_CITIZEN02053_000_000<tab>After witnessing a spectacle like that, everyday life seems rather dull in comparison...

TEXT_JOBDRK299_02110_CITIZEN02053_000_001<tab>Hm? So you didn't see that trial earlier? Ah, your loss. Fury take me, the way that heretic swung that slab of iron he called a sword was a sight to behold!

TEXT_JOBDRK299_02110_CITIZEN02053_000_002<tab>He couldn't have carried a shield if he'd wanted to, the blade was so big. Had to keep two hands on it at all times! I was amazed he managed to keep up with that Temple Knight for as long as he did.

TEXT_JOBDRK299_02110_CITIZEN02053_000_003<tab>Fought like a demon from the deepest pits of the seventh hell, bellowing threats and working his arts. I wasn't sure what to make of it at first, but then I heard someone say that he must be a <var 1A 02 /var>dark knight<var 1A 01 /var>!
TEXT_JOBDRK299_02110_CITIZEN02053_000_004<tab>B-But you didn't hear that from me, eh!? In fact, I'm sure I don't know anything about it!
TEXT_JOBDRK299_02110_CITIZEN02053_000_010<tab>Ye gods, are you mad!? We're standing outside the bloody Tribunal!
TEXT_JOBDRK299_02110_CITIZEN02053_000_011<tab>Fine, fine! But keep quiet and listen well, because I'm only going to say this once!
TEXT_JOBDRK299_02110_CITIZEN02053_000_015<tab>Aye, aye. Let us speak no more of such things. Never know who's listening...
